Deja Vu - Sheer Rocks: Music On The Rocks, Vol 1

Buy Physical Buy Digital Stream
Format: CD, Digital
Release Date: 11th March 2016
Label: Secret Life
Saxophone: Luke Marzec
Electric Guitar: Nat Reading

Sheer Rocks is a beautiful open air restaurant on the West coast of Antigua. The kind of place you dream of slurping on a colourful cocktail whilst catching some rays. Exactly the sort of environment we envisioned our track, Deja Vu to be played. It was quite fitting then that Pete Gooding was tasked with compiling a breezy, feel good compilation to soundtrack those afternoon drinking sessions in the West Indies, placing our debut single in the mix amidst similarly mellow numbers from Telephones, Jose Padilla and Paqua. Heavyweight Balearic.

Previous release: Stats - Rhythm of the Heart (Private Agenda Remix)
Next release: Sienna (Seahawks Remix) - Needwant Kollect
